servinfo.title: Leveling Control Module Removal and Installation (If Equipped)

s1.ptxt: Disconnect connector (1) from headlight leveling control module (2).
Remove headlight leveling control module with its bracket from heater unit (3).

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: For installation, reverse removal procedure noting the following.

item.ptxt: After replacing headlight leveling control module with new one, initialize auto leveling headlight system referring to Initialization of Auto Leveling Headlight System .
